snippet: New York’s new corruption-fighting commission is asking all state lawmakers to provide details never required before about their outside work prompting the Legislature to hire a lawyer.
abstract: New York State Commission to Investigate Public Corruption has asked all state lawmakers to provide details never required before about their outside work, including list of law clients; request prompts Legislature to hire lawyer for possible challenge to panel’s authority.
lead_paragraph: New York’s new corruption-fighting commission is asking all state lawmakers to provide details never required before about their outside work prompting the Legislature to hire a lawyer.

headline.main: Anticorruption Panel Tells State Legislators to Disclose Outside Work and Clients
headline.print_headline: Anticorruption Panel Tells State Legislators to Disclose Outside Work and Clients

keywords.value: Moreland Commission to Investigate Public Corruption (NYS)
keywords.name: organizations
